primarySegments.name: Young Urban Professionals
primarySegments.description: Tech-savvy individuals living in urban areas who are often on the go and value personal safety.

problemsNeeds: Need quick access to emergency contacts
Desire for peace of mind regarding personal safety
Require a discreet way to alert help
behaviors: Likely to download and test new apps
Use the app in both personal and professional settings
Share app with peers for increased safety

primarySegments.name: Elderly Living Independently
primarySegments.description: Older adults living alone who prioritize safety and need easy-to-use technology for emergencies.

problemsNeeds: Concern about falling or health emergencies
Desire for peace of mind for themselves and family
behaviors: Use the app primarily at home
Rely on family for app setup and support
Engage with the app for peace of mind

primarySegments.name: Parents with Young Children
primarySegments.description: Parents who are concerned about their children's safety and want a reliable way to ensure they can quickly alert help if needed.

psychographics: Busy lifestyle balancing work and family
problemsNeeds: Need to ensure quick help in emergencies
Desire to protect children in various settings
Require reassurance when children are not with them
behaviors: Use the app during family outings
Teach children how to use the app
Recommend the app to other parents
